articles.title: Poland coach Czeslaw Michniewicz to leave after contract not renewed
articles.description: Poland drew 0-0 with Mexico, beat Saudi Arabia 2-0 and lost by the same scoreline to eventual champions Argentina in Group C before falling to France in the last 16.
articles.content:
Poland coach Czeslaw Michniewicz will leave at the end of the month with the country’s FA (PZPN) saying on Thursday it will not renew his contract after the team’s last 16 World Cup exit.

articles.title: Argentina Only No. 2 in New FIFA Rankings Led by Brazil, India Still 106th
articles.description: The FIFA World Cup champions Argentina are second but did not topple Brazil from the top spot in the latest FIFA Rankings
articles.content:
Winning the World Cup was not enough to lift Argentina atop the FIFA world rankings with Brazil keeping the No. 1 position on Thursday.

articles.description: Argentina have failed to dislodge Brazil from the top of Fifa’s rankings, while Morocco replace Senegal as Africa’s highest-ranked side
articles.content:

articles.title: World Cup champions Argentina move to second, Brazil stay top
articles.description: France, who were vying to become the first team since Brazil in 1962 to win successive World Cups, have moved up a place to third.
articles.content:
World Cup champions Argentina have climbed one place, to second, in the latest FIFA Rankings. Brazil, who lost to Croatia in quarter-finals, continue to occupy top spot.
